title: Serious Issues with my Google Pixel
content:
Very serious issues with my device
1. The device suddenly switches off at 17% battery. 
2. Speaker doesnt work most of the times! Sometimes it does sometime it doesnt
3. YouTube videos are stuck at the beginning and doesnt play unless connected to bluetooth! 
4. Calling issues. The one i call cant hear me nor can i hear them but the call reaches the opp person! 

Pls help with this all of this started outta nowhere with every new day getting new problems! 
If this is a motherboard issue do let me know the price to repair the same!
